title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Strategies for Building Effective Teaching Presence in Online Education

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three dimensions of teaching presence: instructional design, interaction facilitation, and direct instruction.
Learners can strengthen teaching presence by applying two or more interaction facilitation strategies in large offline settings.
Learners can design differentiated teaching presence strategies based on learner characteristics (gender, field).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
